description:
Save $100 for limited time. (Course is valued at $199).

9/10 new businesses fail within the first year. It's a sad but harsh reality many entrepreneurs face after numerous failed businesses. This course aims to help you achieve the following:

  • Save Money $$$
  • Save Time
  • Be Successful
  • Build Things That Matter
  • Learn The Process/Formula Behind Building a Successful Startup

I agree that there are many courses/books out there that aim to solve a similar problem, but entrepreneurs are still dealing with the same problem.

I'm Jeet Banerjee, a 20 year old serial entrepreneur, digital marketing consultant, author, blogger, public speaker, and startup consultant/advisor. Using a culmination of resources, books, and my own experiences - I share my formula to startup success.

In my course, "How To Build A Startup: From Idea To Successful Business" - you will learn the following:

  • Developing an entrepreneurial mindset
  • How to generate ideas
  • How to create a powerful team behind your ideas
  • How to validate ideas
  • How to analyze markets
  • Product and customer discovery
  • How to build businesses that matter
  • How to minimize startup risk
  • How to open a business with less money and time
  • How to use data to find success
  • How and what pivoting really is
  • Building the ultimate product
  • How to market your business & acquire customers
  • Creating go-to-market strategies
  • How to build a sustainable long-term business

Increase your odds of startup success today. Be the 1/10 businesses that do succeed and have a huge impact on the world.

Take this course to get a complete walkthrough on how to build a business from day 1 to the day your business starts making profit.

Testimonial From Student Who Took Course in July

"My sister and I had been trying to start a business for years, but we were met with failure each time. After finishing this course in a week together, we tried everything you said step by step. We just hit $10,000 in sales 2 months of business for our boutique and I have to thank you for all of our successes Jeet." - Andrea Marie
title: How To Start A Business: Turning Ideas Into Income
